ValidationRule.description: When an External user is reviewing a defected form. The Disclaimer reviewed checkbox is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name = "Community Registrations User", OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Car_Wash", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Janitorial")) && AND(DisclaimerDA__c = true, DisclaimerReviewed__c = false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please indicate that you have reviewed the defects on the Disclaimer section to continue.
